Name: Adios MF
d_ingredients: 1/2 oz Vodka, 1/2 oz Rum, 1/2 oz Tequila, 1/2 oz Gin, 1/2 oz Blue Curacao, 2 oz Sour mix, 2 oz 7-Up
d_instructions: Pour all ingredients except the 7-Up into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-Up and stir gently.
d_shopping: Vodka, Rum, Tequila, Gin, Blue Curacao, Sour mix, 7-Up

Name: Alabama Slammer
d_ingredients: 1 oz Southern Comfort, 1 oz Amaretto, 1/2 oz Sloe gin, 1 dash Lemon juice
d_instructions: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir, add a dash of lemon juice, and serve.
d_shopping: Southern Comfort, Amaretto, Sloe gin, Lemon juice

Name: Alexander
d_ingredients: 1/2 oz Gin, 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao, 2 oz Light cream, Nutmeg
d_instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
d_shopping: Gin, Creme de Cacao, Light cream, Nutmeg

Name: Appletini
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Smirnoff(R) Green Apple Twist vodka, 1 oz DeKuyper(R) Sour Apple Pucker schnapps
d_instructions: Stir ingredients together with crushed ice in a cocktail/martini glass, and serve.
d_shopping: Smirnoff(R) Green Apple Twist vodka, DeKuyper(R) Sour Apple Pucker schnapps

Name: Aviation
d_ingredients: 1 1/4 oz Gin, 1/4 oz Maraschino liqueur, Juice of 1 Lemon, A few pinch Sugar (optional)
d_instructions: Fill cocktail shaker with ice. Juice the lemon and add to the shaker. Add a little sugar, if desired. Pour in gin and maraschino, and shake. Serve straight up in a cocktail glass.
d_shopping: Gin, Maraschino liqueur, Lemon, Sugar

Name: Black Russian
d_ingredients: 3/4 oz Coffee liqueur, 1 1/2 oz Vodka
d_instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.
d_shopping: Coffee liqueur, Vodka

Name: Bloodhound
d_ingredients: 1/2 oz sweet vermouth, 1/2 oz dry vermouth, 1 oz gin, 3 crushed strawberries

Name: Shake all ingredients (except strawberries) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the 3 crushed strawberries and serve.
d_cat: Sweet vermouth, Dry vermouth, Gin, Strawberries

Name: Bloody Caesar
d_ingredients: 1 oz Vodka, Celery salt, 1 dash Worcestershire sauce, 1 dash Tabasco sauce, Clamato juice, Salt, Black pepper
d_instructions: Rim tall glass with celery salt, fill with ice and ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick, straw, and lime.
d_shopping: Vodka, Celery salt, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, Clamato juice, Salt, Black pepper

Name: Bloody Mary
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Vodka, 3 oz Tomato juice, 1 dash Lemon juice, 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce, 2-3 drops Tabasco sauce, 1 wedge Lime
d_instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.
d_shopping: Vodka, Tomato juice, Lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, Lime

Name: Blue Hawaii
d_ingredients: 1 oz DeKuyper(R) Blue Curacao liqueur, 1 oz Smirnoff(R) vodka, 1 oz sweet and sour mix, 2 oz pineapple juice
d_instructions: Blue Hawaii is a tasty recipe modified from a recipe on the reverse of a DeKuyper Blue Curacao bottle.Pour all ingredients into a shaker and shake thoroughly. Pour over crushed ice in a highball glass, and serve.
d_shopping: DeKuyper(R) Blue Curacao liqueur, Smirnoff(R) vodka, sweet and sour mix, pineapple juice

Name: Bourbon Lancer
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz bourbon (4.5 cl, 3/8 gills), 1/2 tsp sugar (2 dashes), 1 dash Angostura bitters
d_instructions: Fill a chilled highball glass with ice cubes. Add bitters and bourbon. Topup with champagne. Garnish with lemon
d_shopping: Bourbon, Sugar , Angostura bitters, Lemon

Name: Breakfast Martini
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Bombay Sapphire gin, 3/4 ozfresh lemon juice, 3/4 oz Cointreau, orange liqueur, 1 tsplight marmalade
d_instructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a piece of a slice of toast.
d_shopping: Bombay Sapphire gin, Lemon juice, Cointreau, Orange liqueur, Light marmalade

Name: Bronx
d_ingredients: 1 oz dry vermouth, 1 oz gin, juice of 1/4 oranges, 1 slice orange
d_instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add orange slice and serve.

d_cat: Dry vermouth, Gin, Orange Juice, Orange

Name: Caipirinha
d_ingredients: 2 tsp granulated Sugar, 1 Lime (8 Wedges), 2 1/2 oz Cachaca
d_instructions: Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the cachaca into the glass. Stir well.
d_shopping: Sugar, Lime, Cachaca

Name: Cape Cod
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz vodka, 4 oz cranberry juice
d_instructions: Combine in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime, and serve.
d_shopping: vodka, cranberry juice

Name: Chicago Cocktail
d_ingredients: 2 oz brandy, 1 dash bitters, 1/4 tsp triple sec
d_instructions: Rub the rim of an old-fashioned glass with lemon and dip in powdered sugar. Pour the brandy, bitters and triple sec into a mixing glass half-filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Pour into the prepared glass, and serve.
d_shopping: brandy, bitters, triple sec

Name: Cosmo
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz vodka, 3/4 oz triple sec, 3/4 oz cranberry juice, 1 ozfresh lime juice
d_instructions: Pour the vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
d_shopping: vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, lime juice

Name: Cucumber Gimlet
d_ingredients: 1 small cucumber, 2 oz fresh lime juice, 2 oz simple syrup, 3 oz Gin
d_instructions: Muddle 8-10 pieces of the cucumber with the lime juice in a drink shaker.Add simple syrup, gin, and ice.Shake well, strain and serve.

d_cat: Small cucumber, Fresh lime juice, Simple syrup, Gin

Name: Daiquiri
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Light rum, Juice of 1/2 Lime, 1 tsp Powdered sugar
d_instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve. (See also Frozen Daiquiri.)
d_shopping: Light rum, Lime, Powdered sugar

Name: Dark and Stormy
d_ingredients: 2 oz Gosling's Black rum, 8 oz Ginger beer
d_instructions: You can substitute any dark or spiced rum . Pour rum over ice, add ginger ale, stir.
d_shopping: Black rum, Ginger beer

Name: French Connection
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Cognac, 3/4 oz Amaretto
d_instructions: Pour ingredients into a old-fashioned glass over ice, stir, and serve.
d_shopping: Cognac, Amaretto

Name: Gibson
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Gin, 3/4 oz Vermouth, 2 Cocktail onion
d_instructions: Stir gin and vermouth over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cocktail onions and serve.
d_shopping: Gin, Vermouth, Cocktail onion

Name: Grasshopper
d_ingredients: 3/4 oz Green Creme de Menthe, 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao, 3/4 oz Light cream
d_instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
d_shopping: Green Creme de Menthe, Creme de Cacao, Light cream

Name: Harvey Wallbanger
d_ingredients: 1 oz Vodka, 1/2 oz Galliano, 4 oz Orange juice
d_instructions: Pour vodka and orange juice into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir. Float Galliano on top and serve.
d_shopping: Vodka, Galliano, Orange juice

Name: Hurricane
d_ingredients: 1 oz Light rum, 1 oz Dark rum, 1 tblsp Passion fruit syrup, 2 tsp Lime juice
d_instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
d_shopping: Light rum, Dark rum, Passion fruit syrup, Lime juice

Name: Ice Pick
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz vodka, 6 oz iced tea, lemon juice
d_instructions: Put vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.
d_shopping: vodka, iced tea, lemon juice

Name: John Collins
d_ingredients: 2 oz Bourbon, 1 oz Lemon juice, 1 tsp superfine Sugar, 3 oz Club soda, 1 Maraschino cherry, 1 Orange slice
d_instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.
d_shopping: Bourbon, Lemon juice, Sugar, Club soda, Maraschino cherry, Orange

Name: Long Island Tea
d_ingredients: 1/2 oz Vodka, 1/2 oz Light rum, 1/2 oz Gin, 1/2 oz Tequila, Juice of 1/2 Lemon, 1 splash Coca-Cola
d_instructions: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.
d_shopping: Vodka, Light rum, Gin, Tequila, Lemon, Coca-Cola

Name: Mai Tai
d_ingredients: 1 oz Light rum, 1/2 oz Orgeat syrup, 1/2 oz Triple sec, 1 1/2 oz Sweet and sour, 1 Cherry
d_instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Top with the cherry and serve.
d_shopping: Light rum, Orgeat syrup, Triple sec, Sweet and sour, Cherry

Name: Mimosa
d_ingredients: Chilled Champagne, 2 oz Orange juice
d_instructions: Pour orange juice into a collins glass over two ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne, stir very gently, and serve.
d_shopping: Champagne, Orange juice

Name: Mint Julep
d_ingredients: 4 fresh mint, 2 1/2 oz bourbon whiskey, 1 tsp powdered sugar, 2 tsp water
d_instructions: Muddle mint leaves, powdered sugar, and water in a collins glass. Fill the glass with shaved or crushed ice and add bourbon. Top with more ice and garnish with a mint sprig. Serve with a straw.
d_shopping: mint, bourbon whiskey, powdered sugar, water

Name: Mojito
d_ingredients: 2-3 oz Light rum, Juice of 1 Lime (1 oz), 2 tsp Sugar, 2-4 Mint sprigs, Soda water
d_instructions: Lightly muddle the mint and sugar with a splash of soda water in a mixing glass until the sugar dissolve and you smell the mint. Squeeze the lime into the glass, add rum and shake with ice. Strain over cracked ice in a highball glass. Top with soda water, garnish with mint sprig and serve.
d_shopping: Light rum, Lime, Sugar, Mint, Soda water

Name: Moscow Mule
d_ingredients: 2 oz Vodka, 2 oz Lime juice, 8 oz Ginger ale
d_instructions: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass with ice and enjoy.
d_shopping: Vodka, Lime juice, Ginger ale

Name: Negroni
d_ingredients: 1 oz Gin, 1 oz Campari, 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
d_instructions: Stir over ice and pour into a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon zest.
d_shopping: Gin, Campari, Sweet Vermouth

Name: Old Fashioned
d_ingredients: 2 oz bourbon whiskey, 2 dashes Angostura(R) bitters, 1 splash water, 1 tsp sugar, 1  maraschino cherry, 1  orange
d_instructions: Mix sugar, water and angostura bitters in an old-fashioned glass. Drop in a cherry and an orange wedge. Muddle into a paste using a muddler or the back end of a spoon. Pour in bourbon, fill with ice cubes, and stir.
d_shopping: bourbon whiskey, Angostura(R) bitters, water, sugar, maraschino cherry, orange

Name: Orange Blossom
d_ingredients: 2 oz Gin, 1 oz Orange juice, 1 tsp superfine Sugar, 1 Orange slice
d_instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, orange juice, and sugar. Shake wel. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the orange slice.
d_shopping: Gin, Orange juice, Sugar, Orange

Name: Panama
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz 151 proof rum, 1/2 oz dark creme de cacao, 1/2 oz cream
d_instructions: Shake ingredients well and serve over ice.
d_shopping: 151 proof rum, dark creme de cacao, cream

Name: Pimm's Cup
d_ingredients: 1 shot Pimm's No. 1, Fill with 7-Up, 1 slice Cucumber, Twist of Lemon peel
d_instructions: In a highball glass add Pimm's No. 1 and twist of lemon. Fill with 7-up. Garnish with cucumber slice.
d_shopping: Pimm's No. 1, 7-Up, Cucumber, Lemon peel

Name: Pina Colada
d_ingredients: 3 oz light rum, 3 tbsp coconut cream, 3 tbspcrushed pineapples
d_instructions: Old-style recipe for this popular drink. The coconut cream needs to have the right consistancy, some find the alternative, coconut milk to be too thin, however you can add condensed milk to coconut milk to bring up it's thickness. Add pineapple juice if desired.Put all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for a short length of time. Strain into a collins glass and serve with a straw.
d_shopping: light rum, coconut cream, pineapples

Name: Pink Lady
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Gin, 1 tsp Grenadine, 1 tsp Light cream, 1 Egg white
d_instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
d_shopping: Gin, Grenadine, Light cream, Egg white

Name: Pousse Cafe
d_ingredients: 1/6 oz grenadine syrup, 1/6 oz creme de cacao, 1/6 oz maraschino liqueur, 1/6 oz Orange Curacao liqueur, 1/6 oz creme de violette, 1/6 oz brandy
d_instructions: Layer in a cordial glass.
d_shopping: grenadine syrup, creme de cacao, maraschino liqueur, Orange Curacao liqueur, creme de violette, brandy

Name: Rob Roy
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Scotch, 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth, 1 dash Angostura bitters, 1 Maraschino cherry
d_instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
d_shopping: Scotch, Sweet Vermouth, Angostura bitters, Maraschino cherry

Name: Rusty Nail
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Scotch, 1/2 oz Drambuie, 1 twist of Lemon peel
d_instructions: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.
d_shopping: Scotch, Drambuie, Lemon peel

Name: Sazerac
d_ingredients: 1 tsp Ricard, 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar, 2 dashes Peychaud bitters, 1 tsp Water, 2 oz Bourbon, 1 twist of Lemon peel
d_instructions: Pour Ricard into a glass and swirl around to coat glass, discard any excess. Place the sugar, Peychaud bitters, and water int othe glass and muddle with the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the bourbon over the ice cubes.
d_shopping: Ricard, Sugar, Peychaud bitters, Water, Bourbon, Lemon peel

Name: Sea Breeze
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz vodka, 4 ozfresh grapefruit juice, 1 1/2 oz cranberry juice
d_instructions: Pour vodka into an iced highball glass. Fill partially with grapefruit juice and top with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.
d_shopping: vodka, grapefruit juice, cranberry juice

Name: Sex on the Beach
d_ingredients: 1 oz Vodka, 3/4 oz Peach schnapps, Cranberry juice, Grapefruit juice
d_instructions: Half fill with cranberry juice and grapefruit juice, stir in highball glass.
d_shopping: Vodka, Peach schnapps, Cranberry juice, Grapefruit juice

Name: Sidecar
d_ingredients: 2 oz Cognac, 1/2 oz Cointreau, 1 oz Lemon juice
d_instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
d_shopping: Cognac, Cointreau, Lemon juice

Name: Stars & Stripes
d_ingredients: 2/3 oz grenadine syrup, 2/3 oz double cream, 2/3 oz Blue Curacao liqueur
d_instructions: Make pousse-cafe (layered) in a cordial or liqueur glass, and serve.
d_shopping: grenadine syrup, double cream, Blue Curacao liqueur

Name: Stinger
d_ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Brandy, 1/2 oz White Creme de Menthe
d_instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
d_shopping: Brandy, White Creme de Menthe

Name: Tokyo Tea
d_ingredients: 1/2 oz vodka, 1/2 oz rum, 1/2 oz gin, 1/2 oz tequila, 1/2 oz triple sec, 1 oz Midori(R) melon liqueur
d_instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain into a small highball glass filled with ice, and serve.
d_shopping: vodka, rum, gin, tequila, triple sec, Midori(R) melon liqueur

Name: Tom Collins
d_ingredients: 2 oz Gin, 1 oz Lemon juice, 1 tsp superfine Sugar, 3 oz Club soda, 1 Maraschino cherry, 1 Orange slice
d_instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.
d_shopping: Gin, Lemon juice, Sugar, Club soda, Maraschino cherry, Orange

Name: Vesper
d_ingredients: 3 oz dry Gin (Gordon's), 1 oz Vodka, 1/2 oz Kina Lillet
d_instructions: Shake well with lots of ice until it is extremely cold, then pour and add a large slice of lemon peel.
d_shopping: Gin, Vodka, Lillet

Name: White Lady
d_ingredients: 2 oz Gin, 1 Egg white, 1 oz Light cream, 1 tsp superfine Sugar
d_instructions: In a shaker half-filler with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
d_shopping: Gin, Egg white, Light cream, Sugar

Name: White Russian
d_ingredients: 2 oz Vodka, 1 oz Coffee liqueur, Light cream
d_instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.
d_shopping: Vodka, Coffee liqueur, Light cream

Name: Zombie
d_ingredients: 1/2 oz Bacardi(R) 151 rum, 1 oz pineapple juice, 1 oz orange juice, 1/2 oz apricot brandy, 1 tsp sugar, 2 oz light rum, 1 oz dark rum, 1 oz lime juice
d_instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice except Bacardi 151 proof rum. Pour into a collins glass. Float Bacardi 151 proof rum on top. Garnish with a fruit slice, sprig of mint and a cherry.
d_shopping: Bacardi(R) 151 rum, pineapple juice, orange juice, apricot brandy, sugar, light rum, dark rum, lime juice
